text: @realDonaldTrump So happy for him & his family. But you can’t bring back 108,000 Americans you allowed to die from Coronavirus and are still allowing Americans to continue to suffer and parish from this highly contagious, suffocating, deadly disease while Rep senate just sits there. Only til 2021
